text:
spacenet.py reads

```
def fit(self, X, y):
        """Fit the learner

        Parameters
        ----------
        X : list of Niimg-like objects
            See http://nilearn.github.io/manipulating_visualizing/manipulating_images.html#niimg
            Data on which model is to be fitted. If this is a list,
            the affine is considered the same for all.

        y : array or list of length n_samples
            The dependent variable (age, sex, QI, etc.).

        Notes
        -----
        self : `SpaceNet` object
            Model selection is via cross-validation with bagging.
        """
```

whereas `SpaceNet{Regressor-Classifier}.fit` on list of niimg data fails.
title: SpaceNet advertises multi-subject capability while it has not
SpaceNet advertises multi-subject capability while it has not
